features: Durable Stainless Steel construction allows for long-lasting endurance while sweeping up dirt, dust, and debris.
2 in 1 Design: This broom and dustpan set is designed with 2 in 1, the broom head can be detachable from the handle, which makes it more convenient to use and store.
This dustpan and broom combo set is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use as a complete solution for any sweeping job.
Flexible rubber bristles pick up dirt from carpets, hardwood floors or uneven surfaces making it safe to use on delicate items without risk of scratching or damaging them.
Ergonomic soft handle grip ensures comfortable operation while the angular shape of the dustpan fits snugly against walls or other hard edges for efficient cleaning performance every time.
body.description: Say goodbye to a dirty floor with the Durable Stainless Steel Broom and Dustpan Set with Teeth for Cleaning Floor! This essential cleaning tool is made of high-quality stainless steel, making it lightweight and easy to carry. Its heavy-duty teeth ensure that even the toughest dirt and dust particles are removed from the floor in no time. With its broom and dustpan design, you can sweep indoors or outdoors with ease. This broom and dustpan combo set is perfect for all areas around your home or office, eliminating any dust, dirt, or pet hair quickly. The two durable handles make it easy to maneuver around tight corners and high-traffic spots. Even better, this set comes with an extra long handle so it can reach underneath low furniture--not a speck of grime will be left behind! Stop struggling with inadequate tools like hand brooms or pure sweeping power alone! You want a reliable product that will get any surface—indoor, outdoor, wet or dry—spotless in no time. That’s why this Durable Stainless Steel Broom and Dustpan Set is perfect for anyone who wants a fast yet thorough clean every time. Get yours today!
